caseTitle: Ali Bux Shaikh v. The Chief Secretary, Government of Sindh, Karachi and others
tagline: (1) Discussion on admission, doctrine of estoppel, acquiescence and approbation and reprobation. (2) Rule 12-A of the Sindh Civil Servants (Appointments, Promotion and Transfer) Rules 1974 does not prohibit the competent authority from making inquiry and rectification of the interpolations made by the Civil Servant in the service book.
